item.title: A Week of Blogging
item.description: My first week of blogging is over and here are 7 highlights: According to people I write better than I talk (so imagine how I talk) It liberates your mind from random thoughts that keep appearing on a daily basis, it’s all about uncluttering Creating habits is easier when you are doing it with somebody else You can create a great unintended debate at dinnertime
